creator: stefan_sjoquist@home.se
text:
I have the following statement in all my JSP files.
<%@include file="/include.jsp"%>

When include.jsp is changed I have to "re-save" all JSP files that has the 
include statement to see the change, i.e. the JSP compiler does not notice that 
the include file has been updated.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
This uses the include directive which does a static include, rather than the 
request dispatcher, which does a dynamic include.
Since the include is done once and for all (ie, it's supposed to be faster), it 
doesn't check if the "included" resources may have been modified.
